publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5266 Tommy Sheridan: Congratulations to Hugo Chavez—That the Parliament congratulates Hugo Chavez on his magnificent victory in the presidential elections in Venezuela; believes that this is an endorsement of his Bolivarian road to socialism and a rejection of the neoliberal approach of Bush and Blair, and further recognises that this is part of a movement to the left throughout Latin America.
S2M-5266 Congratulations to Hugo Chavez (lodged on 4 December 2006) Campbell Martin*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*

S2M-5266 Tommy Sheridan: Congratulations to Hugo Chavez—That the Parliament congratulates Hugo Chavez on his magnificent victory in the presidential elections in Venezuela; believes that this is an endorsement of his Bolivarian road to socialism and a rejection of the neoliberal approach of Bush and Blair, and further recognises that this is part of a movement to the left throughout Latin America. Supported by: Campbell Martin, Ms Rosemary Byrne

S2M-5266 Tommy Sheridan: Congratulations to Hugo Chavez—That the Parliament congratulates Hugo Chavez on his magnificent victory in the presidential elections in Venezuela; believes that this is an endorsement of his Bolivarian road to socialism and a rejection of the neoliberal approach of Bush and Blair, and further recognises that this is part of a movement to the left throughout Latin America. Supported by: Campbell Martin, Ms Rosemary Byrne
